greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = ((n + 1) - 9*(n + 1)^2 + 8*(n + 1)^3)/6.
comment: The start values of the partial rows on the main diagonal of A332662 in the representation in the example section.
Apparently the sum of the hook lengths over the partitions of 2*n + 1 with exactly 2 parts (cf. A180681).
xref: Apparently a bisection of A049779 and of A024862.
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Feb 19 2020
